result.title: 2015 round population projections
result.name: 2015-round-population-projections
result.notes: IMPORTANT NOTE: These projections have been superceded, please see  https://data.london.gov.uk/demography/  for the latest GLA projections.   Four variants of local authority level population projections and one ward-level projection are currenty available: Borough Trend-based projections using a long-term migration scenario. These projections are recommended for longer-term strategic planning purposes. Trend-based projections using a short-term migration scenario. Housing-linked projections incorporating data from the 2013 Strategic Housing Land Availability Assessment (SHLAA) using the Capped Household Size projection model Housing-linked projections incorporating data from the 2013 SHLAA using the DCLG-linked projection model Ward Ward-level projections consistent with the SHLAA Capped Household Size model.   Other projections Household projections consistent with these projections are available  here .   Custom-Age Tool The GLA custom-age population tool allows users to interogate the borough, ward and ethnic group population projections. The custom age tool can be found here .   Notes A note outlining the key differences between the various projection methodologies can be found  here .     REVISION:  21 October 2016. The long term trend and short term trend projections were revised following minor methodological changes to the calculation of births within the trend model.
